name: Roguelike Comic Book
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 41, and was an experiment on procedural narrative generation. Currently it is a very rough prototype, may not even be playable.  I wish I had more time to finish it.

The idea is to make roguelike comic book about a murder story happened in a bar. The story is procedurally generated with Answer Set Programming solver clingo. The player and the AI take turns to make choices on the plots. The player's goal is to achieve a (randomly) given narrative objective, while the AI may be disturbing the plots.

Currently there are only 3 actions that characters can do in the story, and hardly any really interesting plots are likely to be generated with this limited number of choices.  This prototype just gives you a rough idea.

I'm sure I'll get back to it one day.

Sprites were made by @wwwshou.
